TextView.android:text: Any medical emergency has to be delt with great precaution and hasty procedures. The best way is to provide an in-app ambulance booking and tracking service. With this service users can book an ambulance and then track it.

The app would use GPS-based technology to provide fast and reliable first point medical attention. The ambulance (if GPS enabled) could be tracked by any family member if he/she has access of the patients records.
With an increasing emphasis on promoting independent living today, having access to the nearest ambulance to you can provide much needed peace of mind in a worst case scenario.
